We demonstrate **ObservableJS** interactions in a quarto document.

```{ojs}
// create a button that fires an alert
import {html} from "@observablehq/htl";

html`<button onclick="alert('Button clicked!')">Fire me!</button>`
```

```{ojs}
// Interactive capture of ref
viewof ref =  Inputs.text({label: "ref", placeholder: "Enter your ref", value: "ps1:10"})

ref.length;
```
